summary.span: 代表 的可绑定数据的自定义视图，它用于排序、筛选、搜索、编辑和导航。

span.span: Represents a databindable, customized view of a for sorting, filtering, searching, editing, and navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要功能是允许进行数据绑定 Windows 窗体和 Web 窗体上。A major function of the is to allow for data binding on both Windows Forms and Web Forms. 此外，可自定义以提供从数据的子集。Additionally, a can be customized to present a subset of data from the . 此功能使你有两个控件绑定到同一，但该显示不同版本的数据。This capability lets you have two controls bound to the same , but that show different versions of the data. 例如，一个控件可能会绑定到，在表中，显示所有行和第二个可能被配置为显示从已删除的行。For example, one control might be bound to a that shows all the rows in the table, and a second might be configured to display only the rows that have been deleted from the . 还有属性。The also has a property. 这将返回默认值表。This returns the default for the table. 例如，如果你想要创建自定义视图的表，则设置上返回的。For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the on the returned by the . 若要创建数据筛选和排序视图，请设置和属性。To create a filtered and sorted view of data, set the and properties. 然后，使用属性以返回单个。Then, use the property to return a single . 您还可以添加和删除使用的行集中和方法。You can also add and delete from the set of rows using the and methods. 使用这些方法时属性可以设置以指定只有已删除的行或新行显示通过。When you use those methods, the property can set to specify that only deleted rows or new rows be displayed by the . > [!NOTE] > 如果未显式指定的排序条件`DataView`，则`DataRowView`中的对象`DataView`根据 DataView 的相应索引按`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of DataView's corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 使开发人员可以通过创建复杂而功能强大的查询通过使用[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]。allows developers to create complex, powerful queries over a by using [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]. 一个[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询返回的枚举对象，但是，这些对象绑定方案中不容易使用。A [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query returns an enumeration of objects, however, which is not easily used in a binding scenario. 可以从创建[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询并将筛选和排序该查询的特征。 can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query and takes on the filtering and sorting characteristics of that query. [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 扩展的功能通过提供[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]基于表达式的筛选和排序，这样可以更复杂而功能强大的筛选和排序执行比基于字符串的筛选和排序操作。extends the functionality of the by providing [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] expression-based filtering and sorting, which allows for much more complex and powerful filtering and sorting operations than string-based filtering and sorting. 请参阅[数据绑定和 LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md)有关详细信息。See [Data Binding and LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含一列和五个行。The following example creates a single with one column and five rows. 两个创建对象和上每个设置为显示表数据的不同视图。Two objects are created and the is set on each to show different views of the table data. 然后打印值。The values are then printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例创建的按排序的联机订单的应付款的总计[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询：The following example creates a of online orders ordered by total due from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromquery1)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromquery1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向窗体值，指定后跟一个运算符和值要作为筛选依据的列的名称。To form a value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on. 值必须在引号中。The value must be in quotation marks. 例如:For example: "LastName = 'Smith'""LastName = 'Smith'" 请参阅属性的类的详细信息。See the property of the class for more information. 若要仅返回这些列具有 null 值，请使用以下表达式：To return only those columns with null values, use the following expression: "Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'""Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'" ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置其属性。The following example creates a and sets its property. value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用已删除的行方法将具有其值设置为`Deleted`。Only rows that have been deleted by using the method will have their value set to `Deleted`. 使用添加这些行方法将同样具有属性设置为`Added`。Those rows added using the method will similarly have the property set to `Added`. > [!NOTE] > 使用方法类并不意味着某一行将被标记为`Deleted`。Using the method of the class does not mean that a row will be marked as `Deleted`. 使用方法改为以确保这样的行可以查看在。Use the method instead to make sure that such rows can be viewed in the . 新行也将是可见设置为`ModifiedCurrent`或`CurrentRows`。New rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedCurrent` or `CurrentRows`. 已删除的行也将是可见设置为`ModifiedOriginal`和`OriginalRows`。Deleted rows will also be visible when the is set to `ModifiedOriginal` and `OriginalRows`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建单个列，然后更改数据并设置的可显示不同的行集，具体取决于。The following example creates a with a single column, and then changes the data and sets the of the to display different row sets, depending on the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataView.RowStateFilter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未显式指定的排序条件`DataView`，则`DataRowView`中的对象`DataView`根据其对应的索引按`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of its corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Dataview](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md)。For more information, see [DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md). ## Examples 下面的示例指示对表进行排序的两个列。The following example instructs the to sort the table by two columns. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回维护源中的以下属性的值: ， ， ，并。The returned maintains the values of the following properties from the source : , , , and . 在随后出现的每个列包含基础中的所有相应属性的相同副本。Each column in the resulting contains an identical copy of all the corresponding properties in the underlying . 实例在返回`DataTable`将包含与 CLR 语义保持一致的值。The instances in the returned `DataTable` will contain values that are consistent with CLR semantics. 也就是说，除了用户定义类型的所有数据类型，相应列的值按值进行都复制。That is, for all data types besides user-defined types, the corresponding column values are copied by value. 对于用户定义数据类型，是通过引用复制列数据。For user-defined data types, the column data is copied by reference.

span.span: Creates and returns a new based on rows in an existing .

returns.span: 一个新 实例，其中包含请求的行和列。

span.span: A new instance that contains the requested rows and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为此方法不允许您指定的输出名称，其名称是相同的源的名称`DataTable`。Because this method does not let you specify the name for the output , its name is the same as the name of the source `DataTable`. 因为此方法不允许您指定的可用列的子集，输出表包含与输入表相同的列。Because this method does not let you specify a subset of available columns, the output table contains the same columns as the input table. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序示例创建，填充数据，创建基于原始数据的筛选的视图，并最后，创建，其中包含筛选出的行。The following console application example creates a , fills the with data, creates a filtered view based on the original data, and finally, creates a that contains the filtered rows. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableFiltered/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：The example displays the following text in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 Current Values in View 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 Table created from filtered DataView 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 New table name: NewTable ```

[!code-csharp[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataView.ToTableUniqueValues/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` Original table name: NewTable Current Values in Table 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 Current Values in View 3, Bread, Muffin, 23 6, Bread, Croissant, 23 4, Fish, Salmon, 12 5, Fish, Salmon, 15 1, Fruit, Apple, 14 2, Fruit, Orange, 27 Table created from sorted DataView Bread, 23 Fish, 12 Fish, 15 Fruit, 14 Fruit, 27 New table name: NewTable ```
